product_name: Patagonia Arborist Trench Rain Coat - Women's
long_description: With clean lines and a sophisticated silhouette, the waterproof, breathable Patagonia Arborist Coat will keep you comfortable in urban downpours while the rest of the crowd scrambles for cover. H2No(R) Performance Standard 2-layer barrier with a matte, woven face fabric is waterproof, windproof and breathable; jacket is fully lined with crisp, smooth taffeta. Lined hood has hidden adjustment toggles on either side. Two-way asymmetrical zipper with a storm flap secures with two exposed ring snaps at the neck. Asymmetrical cuffs adjust with 2-position snaps. Welted, zippered handwarmer pockets secure with snaps; internal zippered pocket. Curved princess seams on the front and back and a back center reverse pleat create clean lines and movement. Patagonia Arborist Trench has an above-the-knee regular fit.
short_description: With clean lines and a sophisticated silhouette, the waterproof, breathable Patagonia Arborist Coat will keep you comfortable in urban downpours while the rest of the crowd scrambles for cover.
